snippet: Representative Jane Harman, a Los Angeles Democrat and the wife of a millionaire businessman, announced her candidacy for governor today, the deadline for candidates to file declarations of intent.    A moderate Democrat who supports abortion righ...
lead_paragraph: Representative Jane Harman, a Los Angeles Democrat and the wife of a millionaire businessman, announced her candidacy for governor today, the deadline for candidates to file declarations of intent. A moderate Democrat who supports abortion rights and has a pro-business voting record, Ms. Harman joins two other major Democratic contenders: Lieut. Gov. Gray Davis and Alfred A. Checchi, the former co-chairman of Northwest Airlines.
abstract: Rep Jane Harman, moderate Democrat, announces candidacy for California governor (S)
